obtenersecciones.sql: SELECT E.descripcion AS Seccion, '['+ STUFF((SELECT ',{"key":"'+CAST(b.cve_seccion AS VARCHAR(MAX)) + '-'+ CAST(ISNULL(b.cve_subseccion,0) AS VARCHAR(MAX))+'","name":"'+ B.descripcion +'","multi":"'+ CAST(B.multivalores AS VARCHAR(2)) +'","catalogo":{' +ISNULL( STUFF(( SELECT ',"'+ CAST(B.cve_catalogo AS VARCHAR(MAX)) + '-'+ CAST(ISNULL(D.cve_subcatalogo,0) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) +'":"'+ descripcion +'|' + case when ISNULL(valor1,'')='' then 'null' else valor1 end + '-' + case when ISNULL(valor2,'')='' then 'null' else valor2 end +'"' FROM ES_catperdet D WHERE (cve_catalogo=B.cve_catalogo) FOR XML PATH(''),TYPE).value('(./text())[1]','VARCHAR(MAX)') ,1,1,''),'')+'}}' FROM ES_pstperfilsubseccion B WHERE B.activo=1 AND B.cve_seccion=F.cve_seccion --AND B.cve_subseccion=F.cve_subsecuencia FOR XML PATH(''),TYPE).value('(./text())[1]','VARCHAR(MAX)') ,1,1,'')+']' AS JSON FROM ES_pstperfilseccion E INNER JOIN Es_PstPerfilValor F ON E.CVE_SECCION=F.CVE_SECCION INNER JOIN ES_POSICIONES G ON F.NUM_platilla=G.cve_puesto WHERE G.num_plantilla=@num_plantilla GROUP BY F.cve_seccion,E.descripcion

obtenerdatos.sql:
select num_platilla, '['+ STUFF(( select ',{"key":"'+ CAST(cve_seccion AS VARCHAR(MAX)) +'-'+CAST(cve_subseccion AS VARCHAR(MAX)) +'","valor":"'+ isnull(desvalor,'null') +'","publico":"'+CAST(publicar AS VARCHAR(MAX)) +'","catalogo":{'+ STUFF(( select ',"'+ ISNULL(CAST(cve_catalogo AS VARCHAR(MAX)),'null') +'-'+ ISNULL(CAST(cve_subcatalogo AS VARCHAR(MAX)),'null') +'":"'+ ISNULL(CAST(valor1 AS VARCHAR(MAX)),'null') +'-'+ ISNULL(CAST(valor2 AS VARCHAR(MAX)),'null') +'"' from Es_PstPerfilValor where num_platilla=a.num_platilla and cve_seccion=b.cve_seccion and cve_subseccion=b.cve_subseccion ORDER BY NUMERO FOR XML PATH(''),TYPE).value('(./text())[1]','VARCHAR(MAX)'),1,1,'') +'}}' from Es_PstPerfilValor b where num_platilla=a.num_platilla --and cve_seccion=a.cve_seccion --and cve_subseccion=a.cve_subseccion ORDER BY NUMERO FOR XML PATH(''),TYPE).value('(./text())[1]','VARCHAR(MAX)'),1,1,'') +']' AS JSON, (select nombredep from ES_departamentos where cve_departamento=g.cve_departamento) as dep, (select Nombre_Puesto from ES_puestosgenericos where cve_puesto=G.cve_puesto) as puest, g.nivel
from Es_PstPerfilValor a INNER JOIN ES_posiciones G on A.num_platilla=G.cve_puesto WHERE G.num_plantilla=@num_plantilla group by num_platilla,g.cve_departamento,G.cve_puesto,g.nivel
